title: Colombia and Venezuela
creator_credit: William L. Claiborne and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: Among the most advanced on the continent, these Caribbean countries still suffer from the ills that continue to plague all of Latin America. One crop economics, a population explosion and unequal land distribution are certainly negative influences but real changes are being made as the economy continues to expand and diversify.
